name: Ludwig van Beethoven
what_did:
Beethoven wrote powerful music, even after he began losing his hearing.
He created famous works like his 5th and 9th symphonies.
He changed music by showing deep emotions and bold new ideas.
why_matters:
Beethoven showed that great art can come from struggle.
He helped music become more expressive and dramatic.
His courage and music inspire people around the world.
